channel.title: AI-Pulse - Stock Market & Finance
channel.description: Stock Market & Finance news from AI-Pulse

item.title: Palo Alto Networks’ earnings are on deck. Here’s what could get the stock going again.
item.description: Palo Alto Networks shares have been caught up in the software selloff, but analysts are upbeat about recent momentum for its firewall business and the future impact of acquisitions.

item.title: Rivian’s stock just had its best day ever — and now this analyst says to sell
item.description: D.A. Davidson worries that Rivian’s guidance would require the company to see an unusually strong debut of its R2 EV.

item.title: Hegseth considering severe penalty on Anthropic as negotiations stall
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth reportedly is close to putting Claude maker Anthropic on a “supply chain risk” list that would be a devastating blow to its finances.
